title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 801.2 - Requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 801.2 - Requirement

State Regulations

The owner or operator of a public place as defined in section
801.1
(a) of this

Part shall have available, in an accessible area of such public place, resuscitation equipment sufficient to assure that patrons and/or staff can
access it for use and bring it to the victim within three minutes of onset of
an incident, and, in any event, no less than two adult exhaled air
resuscitation masks, two pediatric exhaled air resuscitation masks, all in
their original package, and four pairs of disposable gloves. Exhaled air
resuscitation masks and gloves shall be discarded after a single use and
replaced within 96 hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
801.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
